alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hernando; Inland Hernando (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 4:24PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hernando County through 515 PM EDT... At 423 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hernando County Airport, or near Spring Hill. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spring Hill, Brooksville, Weeki Wachee, Hernando County Airport, North Weeki Wachee, South Brooksville, North Brooksville, Garden Grove, High Point, Brookridge, and Masaryktown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
